titles.title: A NA M ENYE GI EKELE

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A na m enye gi ekele
omemma eh
omemma eh
I worship you

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
you've been so good to me
Faithful God
you so good
you are so kind
King of all kings
Lord of all Lords
champion of champions
I am giving you the praise

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Ana m enye gi ekele
Omemma eh
Omemma eh
I worship you

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Idiighi agbanwe agbanwe
Omemma
I juru obi m eju
Obioma
Ka m bulie gi elu
Otito diri gi
Eze ndi eze
Ana m enye gi ekele

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Ana m enye gi ekele
Omemma eh
Omemma eh
I worship you

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Ekele
Ekele
Omemma
Ekele
I worship you

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Ekele
Ekele
Ekele
Ekele
Ekele
Ekele
I worship you
